div.p: I have got employment again as cotton agent. Mr. Lemeny was very glad to see me and offered me me employment which he said he could not any one else with it is a part of his duties and I act as his deputy I have a desk in Mr Thompsons office. Lemeny wished to turn Thompson out of the room but I told him that the room would be large morn for us both; I shall be at work on Monday; every one seems to be glad to see me and I expect that I shall be able to make something pretty this winter write soon and frequently Love to all
